name: Master Navegator
description:
This is a game made for the Future Game Developers Jam hosted by UNIAT.

  • Genre: Platformer / FPS
  • Platform: Windows
  • Players: 1 player
  • Language: English / Spanish

In this game you use a gun to change the physics of certain objects to move around hazards. You must use this gun to regain control of your ship that has been taken over by an AI trying to kill you.
